about.me: My name is Alexander, I am a Cardano enthusiast and software developer with experience. I want to help decentralize Cardano as I think Cardano is the blockchain of the future. If you feel the same way, then join Adapanda.
about.server: All servers have: "6 vCores and 16 GB RAM". The servers can be upgraded if necessary. The block producing node is secured via 2 relay nodes and one private node. A monitoring server is available to monitor the nodes. More nodes will be added later. All safety precautions have been taken.
